DESCRIPTION: Allows you to delete all invitations for a member or all members.
CONFIRM_ALL: {{loading}} Please confirm that you are sure you want to reset invitations for all server members. Type ``-confirm`` to confirm or ``cancel`` to cancel.
CONFIRM_MEMBER: {{loading}} Please confirm that you are sure you want to reset the invitations of the mentioned member(s). Type ``-confirm`` to confirm or ``cancel`` to cancel.
CANCELLED_ALL: Resetting invitations for all members has been canceled.
CANCELLED_MEMBER: Resetting invitations for the mentioned member(s) has been canceled.
SUCCESS_ALL: All members' invitations have been successfully reset.
SUCCESS_MEMBER: The invitations of the mentioned member (s) have been successfully reset.
TIMEOUT_ALL: The time is up, you haven't validated that you want to reset invitations for all server members.
TIMEOUT_MEMBER: The time is up, you have not validated that you want to reset the invitations of the mentioned member (s).
